title: Completed PE Summary - Golden West
raw_html:
Category Fishing
Registered Owner & Manager: Mr L Laurenson
Port of registry: Oban
Flag: UK
Type: Fishing vessel
Built: 1987
Length overall: 11.35
Gross tonnage: 11.11
Date & Time 09/03/04 11:53
Location of incident: Scottish coastal waters
Incident Type: Flooding/Foundering
Persons onboard: 2 crew
Injuries/ fatalities: 2 injured crew
Damage/ Pollution: Ship Lost

Synopsis

Foundering of fishing vessel.

Action taken:

The Chief Inspector of Marine Accidents made recommendations to owners of the vessel with reference to:

  • The removal of redundant hull fittings.

  • Internal pipework to be electrically connected to the sacrificial anodes.

  • The establishment of a maintenance routine to regularly inspect the pipework for corrosion.
